member.name: M:WYJK.Web.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: 社保接口 未参保-1，待办-2，正常-3，续费-4，待停-5，已停-6

member.name: M:WYJK.Web.Controllers.Http.SocialSecurityController.GetSocialSecurityBase(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 根据参保地获取社保基数范围 社保基数范围：minBase：最小基数，maxBase：最大基数
member.param: 区域:省市名称之间用|隔开，如:山东省|青岛市

member.name: M:WYJK.Web.Controllers.Http.SocialSecurityController.GetAccumulationFundBase(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 根据参公积金地获取社保基数范围 公积金基数范围：minBase：最小基数，maxBase：最大基数

member.name: M:WYJK.Web.Controllers.Http.SocialSecurityController.AddSocialSecurityPeople(WYJK.Entity.SocialSecurityPeople)
member.summary: 添加参保人 SocialSecurityID:社保ID，AccumulationFundID：公积金ID

member.name: M:WYJK.Web.Controllers.Http.SocialSecurityController.ModifySocialSecurityPeople(WYJK.Entity.SocialSecurityPeople)
member.summary: 修改提交参保人 需要传参：参保人ID，社保ID，公积金ID

member.name: M:WYJK.Web.Controllers.Http.SocialSecurityController.ConfirmSocialSecurityScheme(WYJK.Entity.SocialSecurityPeople)
member.summary: 确认社保方案并返回参保信息进行确认 根据以下两个字段来判断是否添加过社保或公积金 IsExistSocialSecurityCase：是否添加社保方案，IsExistaAccumulationFundCase：是否添加公积金方案，socialSecurityFirstBacklogCost：社保第一次代办费，SocialSecurityBase：社保基数，FreezingCharge：冻结金额

member.name: M:WYJK.Web.Controllers.Http.SocialSecurityController.ModifySocialSecurityScheme(WYJK.Entity.SocialSecurityPeople)
member.summary: 更新参保方案 socialSecurityPeople下的SocialSecurityPeopleID也需要传

member.name: M:WYJK.Web.Controllers.Http.SocialSecurityController.AddSocialSecurityScheme(WYJK.Entity.SocialSecurityPeople)
member.summary: 添加社保方案 返回社保ID:SocialSecurityID,公积金ID:AccumulationFundID，总金额:Amount

member.name: M:WYJK.Web.Controllers.Mvc.Loan.LoanAuditController.BatchAudit(System.Int32[],System.String)
member.summary: 批量审核 1、修改审核状态和审核时间 2、修改用户借款表的已用额度和可用额度 3、修改用户账户额度(暂去) 4、记录流水(暂去)

member.name: M:WYJK.Web.Controllers.Mvc.CustomerServiceController.BatchComplete(System.Int32[])
member.summary: 批量通过 注： 参保人客户服务状态变成已审核，并判断对应的订单财务是否已经审核通过 遍历参保人对应的订单，只要有一个是已付款或已完成（如果没有，则需提示），则客服审核状态变成审核通过，如果是订单是已完成，则参保人状态变成待办
